0x05.name: Turret Damage/Repair
0x05.interpretation: Bidirectional resource flow - negative=damage taken, positive=regeneration/repair

0x09.name: Turret Flag 1 (Active/Inactive)
0x09.interpretation: Binary toggle flag - possibly active/inactive or attack/idle mode

0x0A.name: Turret Flag 2 (Vulnerable/Protected)
0x0A.interpretation: Binary toggle flag - possibly vulnerable/invulnerable or targetable/protected

0x0B.name: Turret Activation Event
0x0B.interpretation: Constant 1.0 trigger - likely activation event (attack initiation, aggro trigger, or structure online)

0x0C.name: Turret State Progression
0x0C.interpretation: Fractional state progression - likely capture progress, charge level, or health percentage (0=destroyed, 0.33=damaged, 0.5=half, 1.0=full)

clustering_patterns.description: Action bytes cluster in coordinated sequences

temporal_distribution.description: Continuous activity throughout match (>50% of frames)

turret_lifecycle_model: 2. State Update: 0x0C (set initial state, e.g., 1.0 = full health)
4. Damage Cycle: 0x05 (negative values as damage accumulates)
7. Destruction: Death event [08 04 31] with turret eid
key_findings: All five action bytes exclusively target turret/structure entities (1500-1509)
0x09 and 0x0A are binary flags that toggle for the same entities
0x0C tracks fractional state progression through 5 discrete values
Action bytes cluster in predictable sequences
Active throughout match (56.4% of frames), not concentrated at start/end
limitations: Tournament replays (1 frame) lack these events - may be client-side or extended data
No ground truth data for turret mechanics validation
Cannot map entity IDs 1500-1509 to specific turret types without position data
Third replay missing all 0x05 records - match-specific or hero-specific trigger
Fractional value semantics (0.33 = 33% vs 1/3 stages) ambiguous without game docs
recommendations: Validate 0x0C hypothesis by correlating with VGReborn turret health API
Map entity IDs 1500-1509 to specific turrets using position data
Apply methodology to item events for item-specific action bytes
Plot 0x0C time-series to visualize turret state changes
Correlate with player proximity to identify tower diving events
Record game video for frame-by-frame flag semantics validation
